testsuite.system-out: SQL: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ISSUES ("id" BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, "number" BIGINT NULL, "title" VARCHAR(255) NULL, "state" INT NULL, "body" VARCHAR(255) NULL, "created_at" DATETIME NULL, "updated_at" DATETIME NULL, "closed_at" DATETIME NULL, "user_name" VARCHAR(39) NOT NULL, "id_git_hub" BIGINT NULL) SQL: ALTER TABLE ISSUES ADD CONSTRAINT uk_id_github_issues UNIQUE ("id_git_hub") SQL: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS COMMENTS ("id" BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, "user_name" VARCHAR(39) NOT NULL, "body" VARCHAR(255) NULL, "created_at" DATETIME NULL, "updated_at" DATETIME NULL, "id_issue" BIGINT NULL, "id_git_hub" BIGINT NULL) SQL: ALTER TABLE COMMENTS ADD CONSTRAINT uk_id_github_comments UNIQUE ("id_git_hub") SQL: ALTER TABLE COMMENTS ADD CONSTRAINT FK_COMMENTS_ID_ISSUE_ID FOREIGN KEY ("id_issue") REFERENCES COMMENTS("id") ON UPDATE CASCADE SQL: INSERT INTO ISSUES ("body", "closed_at", "created_at", "id_git_hub", "number", "state", "title", "updated_at", "user_name") VALUES ('body_test', '2019-04-24 19:22:07.570000', '2019-03-24 19:22:07.570000', 1, 1, 0, 'title_test', '2019-03-25 19:22:07.570000', 'user_test') SQL:
